amendment.description: Amendment requires the State Department to maintain records on each incident in which an individual with diplomatic immunity has committed a serious criminal offense within the U.S. and was not subject to the criminal jurisdiction of the U.S.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (numbered 35 as printed in the Congressional Record) to require the State Department to maintain records on each incident in which an individual with diplomatic immunity from the criminal jurisdiction of the U.S. under the Vienna Convention committed a serious criminal offense within the U.S.
